thirdDesignHeaderAboutMe: Hi, I’m Ali. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let’s shake hands with me.
headerAboutMe: I’m Ali. I’m a full-stack developer. I can craft solid and scalable frontend products. Let’s meet!
headerText: Currently Freelancing for UX, UI, & Web Design Project. Invite me to join your team
secondHeaderText: ...who likes to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences.
footerText: Let’s work together on your next product.
footerAltText: Got a question or proposal, or just wantto say hello? Go ahead.

projects.name: Teknolojik Pizza
projects.description: The 'Teknolojik Pizza' website was created to provide a thematic experience focused on the digitalization of the food industry, specifically for pizza ordering or delivery simulation. Designed to help users better understand the online food ordering process, the site incorporates an interactive structure to enhance user engagement.

projects.name: WORKINTECH COMMERCE
projects.description: The website 'WORKINTECH COMMERCE' serves as a practical demonstration of an e-commerce platform, showcasing various functionalities such as product listings, a shopping cart, and order management. It is designed for educational purposes, allowing users to understand how e-commerce applications function. The site is built using modern web technologies, including React for the frontend and Vite for development. For further details, you can visit the site directly

projects.name: To-Do App
projects.description: The website 'alinintodolisti' provides a simple and functional to-do list experience for users to organize their tasks. Such applications allow users to organize their tasks, mark them as completed, and track their progress.

projects.name: Ali Yüzbaşı Portfolio
projects.description: The platform is designed to showcase the developer's skills and projects. It provides users with a detailed presentation of the developer's projects, technical abilities, and experiences, allowing potential employers and clients to effectively get to know the developer.

projects.name: MovieDB
projects.description: The site is a platform that allows users to explore and manage movie data. It aims to enhance user experience by offering functions such as searching, listing, and accessing detailed information about films. The developer has utilized modern web technologies like React and Redux to create a dynamic and interactive interface. The application retrieves updated content via an API. For more information, you can visit the site.

personelInfo.education: Firat University, Software Engineering, Bachelor Degree, 2022
personelInfo.aboutMe: I was born on January 20, 1999, in Ortaköy, Aksaray, where I spent the early years of my education. I completed my undergraduate studies in Software Engineering at Fırat University, graduating in 2022 with a GPA of 2.76. Throughout my studies, I explored different programming languages, developed projects, and gained experience through internships. After graduation, I fulfilled my military service at the MSU Information Technology Department, serving as the Testing and Evaluation Supervisor. Now, I am focused on advancing my career in software development by learning new technologies.

skills.name: JAVASCRIPT
skills.skillDesc: Proficient in using JavaScript extensively in projects, with a strong command of the language's core concepts. Capable of writing and optimizing complex code structures for enhanced performance and maintainability.

skills.name: REACT
skills.skillDesc: Highly skilled in React, applying advanced techniques and best practices for seamless integration in modern applications. Capable of building efficient, maintainable structures while optimizing for performance.

skills.name: REDUX
skills.skillDesc: Proficient in managing application state with Redux, especially in complex projects. Capable of creating optimized, maintainable state management structures for scalable data flow control.

skills.name: NODE
skills.skillDesc: Intermediate proficiency in Node.js, with the ability to handle back-end development for simple to medium-level applications, ensuring both security and performance in server-side code.

skills.name: HTML
skills.skillDesc: Fully adept at using HTML5, following semantic and accessibility standards for optimal structure. Creates clean, well-structured, and responsive code for modern web applications.

skills.name: CSS
skills.skillDesc: Highly skilled in CSS3 and preprocessors, utilizing modern styling techniques and animations effectively. Crafts responsive designs that adapt seamlessly to different screens and devices.

skills.name: BOOTSTRAP
skills.skillDesc: Experienced in Bootstrap for quickly developing responsive designs. Customizes interfaces for user-centric designs that enhance UI/UX.

skills.name: TAILWIND
skills.skillDesc: Proficient in Tailwind CSS, enabling rapid, modular styling. Specializes in creating personalized, high-performance user interfaces.

skills.name: GITHUB
skills.skillDesc: Highly proficient in using GitHub for version control and collaborative development. Effectively manages branches and integrates best practices for team-oriented projects.

skills.name: JAVA
skills.skillDesc: Intermediate knowledge of Java, capable of developing projects with fundamental programming structures and applying OOP principles.

skills.name: FIREBASE
skills.skillDesc: Competent in using Firebase for essential database, authentication, and hosting services in projects. Capable of structuring basic back-end setups and managing data flow.

skills.name: VSCODE
skills.skillDesc: Efficient in using Visual Studio Code, optimizing productivity through advanced configurations and extensions. Customizes the workspace effectively for project-specific needs.

skills.name: PYTHON

skills.name: VERCEL
skills.skillDesc: Skilled in deploying projects on Vercel, with knowledge of CI/CD processes. Capable of setting up continuous deployment for efficient project management.
